title: User Registration with Valid Inputs
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid input data including email, password, and required fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Fill in valid email, password, and other required registration fields
Submit the registration form
Verify that the registration is successful and the user is redirected to the dashboard or login page
Verify that a confirmation email or message is received if applicable

title: User Registration with Invalid Email Format
description: Ensure that the system validates email format during registration and shows appropriate error messages for invalid emails.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter an incorrectly formatted email (e.g. 'user at domain.com') and valid password
Submit the registration form
Verify that registration is blocked and a validation error about invalid email format is displayed

title: User Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify users can successfully log in using valid credentials registered previously.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid registered email and password
Click login button
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected to the admin dashboard

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Ensure system rejects login attempts with invalid email or password combinations and displays error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid email or incorrect password
Click login button
Verify that login is rejected and an appropriate error message is shown

title: Password Recovery Process
description: Verify that registered users can initiate and complete the password recovery process successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the password recovery page
Enter a registered email address
Submit the recovery request
Verify that a password recovery email or notification is sent
Follow instructions to reset password with a new valid password
Verify that the password reset is successful and user can log in with new password

title: Admin Dashboard Financial Data Display Accuracy
description: Validate that the financial management section of the admin dashboard displays accurate daily and monthly sales data and cash flow figures.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to financial management dashboard
Verify that sales data for current day and month matches expected transaction records
Verify that cash flow figures are calculated and displayed correctly
Verify that charts update in real-time when new orders or payments occur

title: Admin Client Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify that admins can create, view, update, and delete client records correctly within the client management section.

steps.description: As admin, navigate to client management page
Add a new client with valid information and save
Verify that new client appears in client list with correct details
Modify client details and save changes
Verify updated details are displayed correctly
Delete the client record
Verify client is removed from the list

title: Admin Menu Product CRUD with Image Upload
description: Test that admins can create, edit, and delete menu products including uploading images with proper cropping and compression.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to menu product management
Create a new product: enter name, description, price and upload an image
Use image cropping and compression tools during upload
Save the product
Verify product is listed with correct details and image displays properly
Edit the product details and image and save updates
Verify changes are reflected correctly
Delete the product
Verify product is removed from the menu

title: Order Placement with Upsell Suggestions in Online Menu
description: Validate that customers can browse the online menu, add items to cart, are presented with upsell suggestions, and confirm order sent via WhatsApp formatted message.

steps.description: Navigate to a public digital menu link
View product catalog with various snack bar items
Add one or more products to the shopping cart
Verify upsell (salesPrediction) suggestions are displayed relevantly
Review shopping cart totals including applicable delivery fees
Complete checkout triggering messaging system
Verify order details are sent correctly and formatted properly in WhatsApp message to snack bar

title: Order Management via Draggable Kanban Board
description: Test that administrators can manage, update, and reorder orders using drag-and-drop Kanban boards reflecting order statuses from pending to delivered.

steps.description: Admin logs into dashboard and accesses order management board
Verify orders are displayed correctly in respective status columns
Drag an order card from 'Pending' to 'In Progress' column
Verify status update is saved and reflected in real-time
Continue dragging order through statuses up to 'Delivered'
Confirm all status transitions trigger background updates without lag

title: PIX Payment Processing with QR Code Generation
description: Verify that payments via PIX are processed successfully using AbacatePay and Stripe, including correct QR code generation and display.

steps.description: Place an order and select PIX as the payment method
Trigger payment processing via AbacatePay or Stripe backend integration
Verify that QR code is generated and displayed correctly for the payment transaction
Complete payment using PIX app scanning QR code
Confirm payment success status updated in the order and admin dashboard

title: Offline Data Caching and Synchronization
description: Validate that application supports offline mode by caching required data locally and synchronizing changes when internet connectivity is restored without data loss.

steps.description: Simulate starting the app with internet connection
Navigate through menu and place an order
Disable internet connection to simulate offline mode
Verify that cached menu and data remain accessible and usable offline
Place orders or make updates offline
Restore internet connection
Verify that offline changes are synchronized with backend correctly without duplication or loss

title: Order Notifications via Telegram Messaging Integration
description: Verify that order notifications are correctly sent to configured Telegram channels/groups with accurate message formatting.

steps.description: Place a new order through the online menu
Verify that a notification message containing correct order details is sent to the configured Telegram channel/group
Confirm message format complies with the requirements and contains all necessary information

title: QR Code Generation for Physical Menu Access
description: Ensure admins can generate and download QR codes for tables or counters that customers scan to access the online digital menu.

steps.description: Admin navigates to QR code generation section in dashboard
Generate QR code linked to a specific table or counter slug
Verify that QR code is generated and is scannable
Download or share the generated QR code
Confirm QR code leads to the correct digital menu page

title: User and Store Branding Customization Application
description: Verify that admins can update brand colors, logos, and menu settings that reflect instantly in both admin UI and the customer digital menu interface.

steps.description: Admin accesses branding customization settings in dashboard
Update primary and secondary colors, upload new logo, and adjust menu display settings
Save changes
Verify updates are reflected immediately in the admin dashboard UI
Access the public digital menu page
Confirm that the digital menu UI reflects the updated branding, colors, and logo

title: Security: Enforced Row Level Security (RLS) Restrictions
description: Test that Supabase backend enforces RLS policies correctly preventing unauthorized data access by other users or admin accounts.

steps.description: Login as Admin User A
Attempt to access or query data belonging to Admin User B via API or dashboard
Verify that access is denied and data is not retrieved
Attempt unauthorized data modifications for resources not owned by logged-in user
Confirm updates or deletes are rejected by backend enforcing RLS

title: Real-time Order Status Updates Reflection
description: Verify that order status changes are propagated instantly to both the admin dashboard and customer's optional order tracking interface using Supabase Realtime.

steps.description: Place an order as a customer and note order ID
Admin updates order status from pending to preparing
Verify customer interface reflects updated status without page reload
Admin advances order status to delivered
Confirm real-time update is displayed accurately for both admin and customer

title: End-to-End Ordering and Payment Flow
description: Perform an end-to-end test covering menu browsing, adding items, upsell suggestions, checkout, PIX payment with QR code, order notification to admin, and updating order status.

steps.description: Customer accesses public digital menu
Add products to cart including upsell suggested items
Proceed to checkout selecting PIX payment
Complete payment via PIX scanning generated QR code
Verify order payment success and status update
Order notification is received in admin dashboard and messaging channels
Admin updates order status through Kanban board until delivered
Confirm customer receives real-time status updates reflecting each stage

title: Admin Dashboard Responsiveness and Mobile-First UI
description: Verify that the admin dashboard and digital menu interface are fully responsive and adapt properly to various screen sizes on mobile and desktop devices.

steps.description: Open admin dashboard on desktop browser and verify layout and elements
Verify UI is consistent, controls are accessible and visually accurate
Repeat access on various mobile devices and screen sizes using browser emulation or physical devices
Verify that UI rearranges and scales correctly according to device dimensions and brand color configurations

title: Error Handling for Failed PIX Payment
description: Ensure proper error handling and user notifications when PIX payment attempts fail or timeout during the checkout process.

steps.description: Initiate PIX payment during checkout
Simulate payment failure (network issue, declined payment, etc.)
Verify that user receives clear error message indicating payment failure
Verify that order remains in pending state and user can retry payment
